name: Coming Home (T-Wolf)
description:
This game is still in development.

The first game I've ever made before! This is a little project that I'm working on, after getting the idea from looking at a fox plushie on my desk. From there, I thought of the natural setting of a forest, and after more expansion of the idea, here we are!

Play as a little fox wandering around in the forest for food at night. But you're not alone- you need to escape hunters that set traps around the woods. You'd better find your way back to your den before they find you!

While the full idea is much more refined and larger than what is currently up, I hope you enjoy this little project as it keeps on expanding to my full vision!

Controls:
AD or arrow keys: movement left and right
Spacebar: Jumping
